plot: It's the last day of the world in the small Mexican city of Saltillo. Azucena decides to confess her life-long love to Francisco, the priest at her local church. Consequences ensue from their decisions...
title: Fin del mundo
plot_es: It's the last day of the world in the small Mexican city of Saltillo. Azucena decides to confess her life-long love to Francisco, the priest at her local church. Consequences ensue from their decisions...
plot_en: It's the last day of the world in the small Mexican city of Saltillo. Azucena decides to confess her life-long love to Francisco, the priest at her local church. Consequences ensue from their decisions...
